lyrics:
5 contributorsdown lyricschorus

pain is what im showin

no he didnt know the game
see miranda lambert liveget tickets as low as 90you might also likechorus
so down is where im goin

verse 3

my wind will blow you to your knees
stay away from me

chorus

pain is what im showin
